root.title: ccc credit for hondura switch TO white corn
root.body: the commod credit corpor ccc announc 1.5 mln dlr credit guarante previous earmark cover sale dri edibl bean hondura switch cover sale white corn u. agricultur depart say the depart say action reduc coverag sale dri edibl bean 500,000 dlr creat new line 1.5 mln dlr sale white corn all sale credit guarante line must regist ship septemb 30 1987 say
